problem.markdown:
>>Let Y be a random variable that indicates the number of throws you need in order to get all six numbers at least one time for each. (Minimum for Y is 6, but Y can be very large if you are unlucky) Find E[Y]. (Round solution to 1 decimal place)<<
= 14.7 +-5%

numericalresponse.label: Let Y be a random variable that indicates the number of throws you need in order to get all six numbers at least one time for each. (Minimum for Y is 6, but Y can be very large if you are unlucky) Find E[Y]. (Round solution to 1 decimal place)
